I like this game. Too much nostalgia

A must buy. A classic, very fun, still very active after so many years. Good quality game, however, jumping back into it after not playing for a long time is super hard. Everyone in the game plays like they've been playing it every single day since it came out, it does have hard aiming mechanics and pretty in depth movement mechanics, but once you get used to it, it's a pretty fun game. Great for low end PC's, and most fun when played with friends.
